channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Enable Now
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Enable Now

item.title: CVE-2022-35297|2024-08-03T09:36:43.435Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20enable%20now
item.description: The application SAP Enable Now does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs over the network before it is placed in the output being served to other users, thereby expanding the attack scope, resulting in Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability leading to limited impact on Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.
